dcterms:description: The UCI HAR dataset contains 6 activity classes (WALKING, WALKING_UPSTAIRS, WALKING_DOWNSTAIRS, SITTING, STANDING, LAYING). 30 volunteers performed the six activities wearing a smartphone on the waist, capturing 3-axial linear acceleration and 3-axial angular velocity at a constant rate of 50Hz.
dcterms:title: UCI HAR data
